content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Yes We Can!" TV series – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(December 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*2014 Singaporean TV series or program **Yes We Can!** is a [Mediacorp Channel 8](/wiki/Channel_8_(Singaporean_TV_channel)) [Chinese New Year](/wiki/Chinese_New_Year) drama. It stars [Romeo Tan](/wiki/Romeo_Tan), [Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim), [Xu Bin](/wiki/Xu_Bin), [Sora Ma](/wiki/Sora_Ma), [Chen Liping](/wiki/Chen_Liping), [Chen Hanwei](/wiki/Chen_Hanwei), [Eelyn Kok](/wiki/Eelyn_Kok) and [Yao Wenlong](/wiki/Yao_Wenlong) as the main casts of the series. ## Cast CastRole[Xu Bin](/wiki/Xu_Bin)Li Yi 李毅[Sora Ma](/wiki/Sora_Ma)Zhu Siyi 朱思仪[Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim)Zhang Xueqin 张雪芹[Romeo Tan](/wiki/Romeo_Tan)Liu Junwei 刘骏卫[Chen Liping](/wiki/Chen_Liping)Liu Cailing 刘彩玲[Chen Hanwei](/wiki/Chen_Hanwei)Hong Qingshan 洪青山[Dennis Chew](/wiki/Dennis_Chew)Mr Chew[Chen Tianwen](/wiki/Chen_Tianwen)Jiang Wen 江汶[Chen Shucheng](/wiki/Chen_Shucheng)Zhu Haitao 朱海涛[Huang Shi Nan](/wiki/Huang_Shi_Nan)Mr Feng 冯先生[Yao Wenlong](/wiki/Yao_Wenlong)Li Xiaoyou 李小柚[Fang Rong](/wiki/Fang_Rong_(actress)) ## Awards and nominations ### [Star Awards 2015](/wiki/Star_Awards_2015) Yes We Can! is nominated in 5 categories. It Won 1 out of 5 awards, Best Actress. Nominee / WorkAwardAccoladeResultIvan Goh Eu JinBest Costume & Image Design[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2015)Nominated[Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim)[Favourite Female Character](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Favourite_Female_Character)Nominated[Romeo Tan](/wiki/Romeo_Tan) & [Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim)[Favourite Onscreen Couple (Drama)](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Favourite_Onscreen_Couple_(Drama))Nominated[Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim)[Best Actress](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Actress)Won - [List of programmes broadcast by Mediacorp Channel 8](/wiki/List_of_programmes_broadcast_by_Mediacorp_Channel_8) This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Yes We Can! (TV series)
